settings.title: Settings
settings.wipeConfirmMessage: This action will erase all Pubky Ring data and cannot be undone.

network.backOnlineDescription: You can now authorize with Pubky Ring
network.offlineDescription: You need to be online to authorize with Pubky Ring

auth.trustWarning: Make sure you trust this relay, service, browser, or device before authorizing with your pubky.
auth.navigateBackToBrowser: Please navigate back to your browser.
auth.timeoutError: The authentication process took too long. Please try again.

import.title: Import Pubky
import.invalidClipboardData: Clipboard does not contain a valid recovery phrase or secret key

pubky.selectToProcess: Please select a pubky to proceed
pubky.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this pubky?
pubky.selectPubkyMessage: Select which pubky you want to use to authorize this service, browser or device.
pubky.noPubkysAvailable: You do not have any pubky's that are setup and available. Please create and setup a pubky first.
pubky.yourPubkyDescription: This is your first unique identifier, your pubky. Create as many as you need for different purposes. You are your keys.

backup.backupMessage: Enter a password or passphrase to encrypt and secure your backup. Keep it safe, you'll need it to restore your pubky.
backup.importMessage: Enter your password or passphrase to decrypt your pubky backup.
backup.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least {{min}} {{chars}} long
backup.recoveryPhraseMessage: Write down these 12 words in the right order and store them in a safe place.
backup.recoveryWarning: Never share your recovery phrase with anyone as this may result in the loss of access to your profile, data, and online identity.

onboarding.title: Keychain for the next web.
onboarding.subtitle: Pubky Ring enables you to securely authorize services and manage your pubkys, devices, and sessions.

welcome.homeserverMessage: Your invite code is valid. Your pubky {{pubky}} is now configured to use the Synonym homeserver for data hosting.

errors.failedToParseQR: Failed to parse QR code data
errors.failedToProcessQR: Failed to process QR code data
errors.noClipboardPubky: No pubky provided for clipboard handling

terms.title: Terms of Use.
terms.acceptTerms: I declare that I have read and accept the terms of use.
terms.acceptPrivacy: I declare that I have read and accept the privacy policy.
